name: rename-file-with-creation-date
description: Application created to rename multiple images and videos using their creation date metadata by NPM commands on Mac.

scripts.preinstall: npm run install:global && npm install --package-lock-only --ignore-scripts && npx npm-force-resolutions
scripts.lint: npm run prettier:fix && npm run eslint:fix

keywords: get all metadata info of your files
rename images and videos using their creation date
rename photos using exif metadata on Mac
rename multiple files and folders using NPM commands
author: Beatriz Sope√±a Merino <beatrizsmerino@gmail.com>
